description: Support for Development of Inclusive Markets in Tourism

subproject.corporate outcome: Capacities of national and local institutions enhanced to scale up proven MDG acceleration interventions and to plan, monitor, report and evaluate the MDG progress in the context of related national development priorities
subproject.description: The project will support the government of Uganda in the development of markets in tourism, focusing on the participation of the poor and local communities in the tourism sector as entrepreneurs, employees and consumers. This will contribute to increased benefits for the poor in terms of improved access to labour and markets; and increased opportunities for decent work and incomes. This will be achieved creation of markets linkages, development and promotion of new niche products that are also pro-poor and building capacity of key tourism support institutions and associations.
subproject.title: Inclusive Markets in Tourism

title: Support for Development of Inclusive Markets in Tourism
